title: Account Hacked, Questions About Riot Support
body:
Hello!

I attempted to log into my account last night and was unsuccessful. After some digging, I found that my account has been hacked. I already opened a ticket with riot support, but I was wondering approximately how long it would take to have this addressed. I know I am being impatient, but I am anxious to gain control of my account again. 

Thanks for any guidance!
Meggs

replies.body: The *average* response time for NA tends to be around 12 hours usually! No worries about being impatient, losing access to one of your favorite games can be a little nerve-wracking for sure =(. Don't fret too much, those agents will be able to repair any damage that might have happened!
